subject: Re: FilaSorb landing page
preview: Hi Lucy, Confirming we have made the below changes and added the NEW tags as well.

full_threads.body:
Hi Lucy, 

Confirming we have made the below changes and added the NEW tags as well.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hey Heath,

Great! Thanks for the update.

Can we have the 'new' banners re-added to the new colours on sampling for all 3 sites? Think these dropped off the other 2 sites.

Can we also change the buttons to: "LEARN MORE"



And this one I'd change to: 'VIEW PRODUCT THICKNESSES'



Otherwise looks great - thanks for all your work on this!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com
Logged 1hr to Harvest
@rica 1 hr please

Hi Lucy, 

Confirming the below changes have now been made and we have rolled out to all three sites.

Hey Heath,

Final requests - can we add a button here 'VIEW COLLECTION THICKNESSES' and link to this page: https://acoufelt.com/au/product/colourways/



Add button here that says 'OUR SUSTAINABILITY COMMITMENTS'



Can we have this link to: https://acoufelt.com/au/sustainability/

Then can you please then publish this pages, ensure this page replaces acoufelt.com/filasorb? And then carry this across all 3 sites? Please action this ASAP so that I can share links with the team this afternoon.

Thanks Heath!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hey Heath,

New booklet attached if you could please switch these out.

Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy, 

I was using this booklet: https://acoufelt.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/FilaSorb-Booklet_v5.pdf

Is that not correct? I'm not sure what you mean sorry...

Looks great Heath - can you please update with the latest booklet I sent you? Ta

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

Logged total of 5 hrs to Harvest
@rica please add a total of 5 hours for this ticket.

Hi Lucy, 

Sure, confirming we have made those updates. https://acoufelt.com/filasorb-new/

Looks great Heath -

2 small changes:

  1. Update the green next to the FWC to the attached

  2. Can we add an 'order your samples' tab or dropdown at the top of the page that sends the user to the bottom so that this isn't missed on the page?



Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy, 

Ok sure, confirming we have now updated the below and added some 'NEW' tags.

Hey Heath,

Just jumped onto the FilaSorb page to see your progress - it's looking great!

One thing I wanted to add was - on the individual colourway sampling at the bottom of the page - are we able to indicate which are the new colours with some text or a small banner? FYI the new colours are:

Popcorn

Pistachio

Thistle

Peacock

Oregano

Kale

Denim

Azur

Periwinkle

Iris

Berry

Lilac

Peach

Peppercorn

Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hey Heath,

Correct we go live on Tuesday. If you can action these by tomorrow that would allow us to stay on track.

Just another quick comment to add to the below:

Can we please add colour names and codes as a hover/overlay to the banner displaying all of the colours.

Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy, 

I'm working on this now and will get through as much of it was possible. When is your deadline? Is it still Tuesday for the launch?

Hey Heath,

Sorry to be pushy on this but can you please make these changes ASAP as we're working on a strict deadline.

Thanks so much!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hey Heath,

Thanks for all your work on this - have some feedback:

First Banner: Remove zoom, change to gentle scrolling of images. Hover over each image for 1-2 seconds longer.

Second Banner: TM on FilaSorb looking big - can we fix this.

Fourth Banner: Change to 'Color Technology' and Remove the middle marker from the color wheel image. Can we also please add a button that links to the QuietPrint page to Learn more ('Learn more about QuietPrint™')

Fifth Banner: Move Acoustic spectrum in to the the left to show a bit more of the image, including the orange layer.

Seventh Banner: Change title to: Acoustic FWC™ + FilaSorb™. Update image with the attached. Update copy to:

Our Acoustic FWC™ Philosophy reflects the holistic approach we take when creating acoustic products for shared working, learning and living spaces. With design-led acoustic solutions available for the Floor, Wall and Ceiling, FilaSorb™ felt is a key material component within Acoufelt's collections.

Last Banner:

Left side: can we create something similar to this? Straighten up the booklet and don't add the extra green box on the outside. Text can be displayed directly onto the image.



On Right side: Can we integrate the below function on this page so people can select the samples they want. Can we also please add an 'Order samples' button or tab added to the top of the landing page that jumps down to the bottom of the page so that people can access this quickly if directed to the landing page? If there's not enough room then separate the booklet banner from the sampling banner.



Let me know if you have any questions! Thanks 😊

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy, 

Please see the updated page here: https://acoufelt.com/filasorb-new/ and let me know your thoughts?

Oh no!! Sorry Heath.. not sure why it was deleted! That's ok tomorrow will be fine. Thanks heaps

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager
